description: Well marked trail to peak with a little parking area very near the junction of Willisville Rd and highway 6. Beautiful views of the north channel, killarney park and the surrounding country side.Remnants of an old Forestry service tower can be seen at the top. And 5 of the 7 Group of Seven painters have painted on the top of this peak. A massive amount of history here.Very amazing little hidden gem!Lots of history here, check out http://www.willisville.ca/willisville mountain.htm for more info!
directions: Hwy 6 South from Espanola Ontario toward Manitoulin Island. Turn Left on Willisvile Rd. Small parking spot just up the hill.
title: Willisvile Mountain
